element.name: TabFolder
element.description: SWT TabFolder controls (don't mix up with CTabFolder).

property.name: background-color
property.description: Background color for tab folder headers.

property.name: border-top-color
property.description: The top border color. This color is used when the TabFolder style flag SWT.TOP is set.

property.name: border-bottom-color
property.description: The bottom border color. This color is used when the TabFolder style flag SWT.BOTTOM is set.
